page.title: 15Laughton Area-Dancing
page.content: Lots of people who live in this area go sequence dancing, so we thought we would talk to two ladies who enjoy this pastime. They told us that this kind of dancing is so popular that people are able to go every night if they travel about. Dances are held in local village halls and social clubs. Sequence dancing is different from other kinds of dancing because everyone does the same steps. The music is fairly modern, so you could say that it is like barn dancing or folk dancing to modern music. Some dances are the same all over the country, but our area does have its own special dances. This kind of dancing is enjoyed by both young and old people and is relaxing and more sociable than ballrom dancing.
